resources.string: Abubuwan Gatan Samun Tsarin Tsarin da ake amfani da su a cikin wannan sabis ɗin sune kawai:
"- Lalacewar Dama: don sanya maɓallin da ba a iya gani a kusa da ƙasa da yanke kyamarar gaba don aiki azaman gajeriyar hanya don zaɓaɓɓun ayyuka masu amfani."
Bayanin Sabis na Samun damar API
Canja hasken allo tsakanin ƙananan ƙima da ƙima
"Sanya ramin kamara ya zama mai mu'amala, yayin da babu sanarwa ko abubuwan da za a nuna, danna yanke yanke kamara zai:"
Yadda za a ba da izinin aikin da aka zaɓa
Juya yanayin ringi (sauti/ bebe). a sauƙaƙe kashe wayar kafin yin barci kuma saita ta zuwa yanayin sauti lokacin da kuka tashi
Da farko ba da izinin sabis na samun dama
Da farko kunna sanarwar Dynamic bayan kammala saitunan
Da farko ba da izinin shiga sanarwar
Bada izini na farko don Allah
Kawai don gwaji, ba ainihin sanarwa ba.
Bada app damar yin aiki a bango
Da fatan za a koma zuwa wannan gidan yanar gizon %1$s kuma duba matakai tare da hotuna
Muhimmiyar sanarwa ita ce wacce galibi ana karɓa azaman sanarwar faɗowa
Yana farawa a cikin cikakken allo yayin da allon ke Kashe
Yi yankan kyamara a matsayin siffar lissafin
"Fahimtar abun cikin sanarwar yayin da na'urar ke kulle."
"Nuna sanarwa a kusa da rami na kyamara ko a wurare daban-daban akan allo tare da yawancin salon zamani don zaɓar daga. Hakanan za'a iya saita shi azaman haske na LED."
Yi amfani da ramin kamara azaman alamar matakin baturi azaman layin madauwari a kusa da rami kamara kuma yana nuna ci gaban caji.
Nuna abubuwan zazzagewar da ake aiwatarwa a halin yanzu azaman layin ci gaba madauwari kusa da rami kamara.
Juya ramin kyamara zuwa maɓallin gajeriyar hanya! saita ayyuka masu zaman kansu don kowane taɓawa, danna sau biyu, dogon dannawa da swiping bangarorin biyu na kyamara.
Nuna gunkin mai rai yana wakiltar caji da matakin baturi
Shawarar faɗaɗa sanarwar don share ta, kuma zai share ainihin sanarwar
Click zai bude shi kuma dogon danna zai fadada shi
Aiwatar da launukan fuskar bangon waya
Lokacin da aka ganuwa Sanarwa mai ƙarfi ta ɓoye matsayin sandar ta rufe shi da launi mai dacewa kuma lokacin da babu Faɗin Faɗakarwa mai ƙarfi yana nuna sandar matsayi.
Bayanin samun damar bayanan mai amfani

"Shiga gida. ba tare da adanawa ko raba bayanan ku ba. duk ana yin aiki a gida a cikin lamba akan wayarka. - Nemo duk fakitin da aka shigar don ku iya keɓance kalar Faɗakarwa Mai Sauƙi kowace ƙa'ida. "
Da farko musaki Dynamic Notification sannan kunna Taimako sannan kunna Dynamic Notification
"Nuni da aka karɓi sanarwar a cikin sigar faɗaɗa, ana raguwa bayan ƴan daƙiƙa kaɗan kuma ana iya rage girmanta, buɗewa ko sharewa ta hanyar mu'amala da ita."
"Nuni ya karɓi sanarwar a cikin ƙaramin tsari, wanda za'a iya faɗaɗawa, buɗewa ko sharewa ta hanyar mu'amala da shi."
"Nuni da aka karɓi sanarwar a cikin faɗaɗɗen tsari idan sanarwa ce mai mahimmanci, kuma a cikin ƙaramin tsari don sanarwa ta al'ada."
Da zarar bayan karɓar sanarwar, sannan a sake nunawa bayan duk lokacin da allon ya buɗe ko kulle.
Bada wannan app ɗin yayi aiki lokacin da kuke so.
Bada tsarin don hana wannan app daga aiki wani lokaci.
Aiwatar da tasiri akan faɗaɗa sanarwar kuma
Da farko kunna Taimako sai wannan
Yana da mahimmanci don kunna su cikin tsari; da farko ba da damar Taimakon Faɗakarwa Mai Raɗaɗi sannan kunna Sanarwa mai ƙarfi
Adadin yana ɗaukar ku daƙiƙa guda yana nufin a gare ni har abada kuma yana ƙarfafa ni don yin ƙarin salo da fasali
Fuskar allo lokacin da kake faɗaɗa sanarwa da hannu don mai da hankali kan faɗaɗa sanarwar
Dim allo lokacin da kuka faɗaɗa sanarwa da hannu don mai da hankali kan faɗaɗa sanarwar
Kalli fiye da talla don samun ƙarin taɓawa

"Salon cikakken allo, mai sauƙin karantawa lokacin da waya ba ta hannu, mai sauƙin amsawa da sake kunnawa zuwa sanarwa. za a iya saita don nuna sanarwar yayin da allon na'urar ke kashe sannan kuma da hannu fadada tsibirin sanarwar zuwa yanayin cikakken allo yayin da allon na'urar ke kunne."
Don mayar da martani ga sanarwa ba tare da karanta abinda ke ciki ba
Saitunan samfoti suna canza gwajin Faɗakarwa Mai ƙarfi
Kira jihar kawai (kira/ba a kira), ba tare da sanin cikakkun bayanan kira ba, don guje wa accedintal taɓawa yayin kiran waya.
"-An Canja Jihar Window: Ramin kyamara mai hulɗa"

"- Lalacewar Samun damar: don haka lokacin da kuka sami sanarwa, yayin da allon ke kunne, wannan sabis ɗin zai zana ƙaramin samfoti a matsayin tikiti kusa da yanke kyamara, yana ɗauke da bayanan sanarwa. "
Ta ci gaba ka yarda da mu
Aiwatar da salon (hoto kawai) don caji, kiɗa da abubuwan ringi
Zoben ci gaba yana nuna ana cajin baturi
Koren walƙiya yana ƙyalli a kusa da rami kamara
Jan wuta yana kyalkyali a kusa da rami kamara
Zoben ci gaba yana nuna matakin baturi na yanzu
Nuna alamar baturi onlu yayin kan allon ƙaddamarwa
Baka gajiya da tsarin sanarwa na gargajiya akan android?!
Fadada ta atomatik lokacin nunawa yayin da allon ke kashe
Idan akwai sanarwa da/ko aukuwa da yawa
Nuna Sanarwa mai ƙarfi yana nuna kunna kiɗan
Babu abubuwa da ke akwai, da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
Babu bayanan mai amfani da aka tattara ko raba kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin Google Play store -> wannan shafin app -> Tsaron Bayanai.
Kar a nuna a yayin da allon ke cikin yanayin shimfidar wuri
Kada ku yi aiki yayin da allon ke cikin yanayin shimfidar wuri
"Ka'idar ba ta da izinin shiga Intanet, don haka bayananku ba sa zuwa ko'ina, kuna iya tabbatar da wannan da'awar daga bayanan app -> izini, akan google play ko gunkin app na dogon lokaci."
"Wannan na'urar ba ta ƙunshi ramin kamara ba. Koyaya, har yanzu kuna iya amfani da fasalulluka masu mu'amala ta hanyar taɓa tsakiyar tsakiyar allon kamar akwai ramin kamara"
Yi amfani da saitunan ci gaba
Idan yanke kamara ba rami bane
Idan gano ramin kamara ta atomatik ba daidai ba ne, zaku iya daidaita shi a cikin (girma da jeri).
Ba kwa buƙatar bayanin wannan zaɓin
Samfuran sanarwar canza launi kusa da yanke kamara
Saitunan Tsari -> Samun dama -> ayyukan kunnawa/ shigar da su -> Mai Taimakon Fadakarwa Mai Tsayi
Yi amfani da yanke kamara don samfotin sanarwar da aka karɓa a cikin keɓaɓɓen tsari mai ƙirƙira
Saitunan Tsari -> Samun dama -> ayyukan kunnawa/ shigar da su -> Sanarwa mai ƙarfi
Saitunan Tsari -> Samun dama -> ayyukan kunnawa/ shigar da su -> Sanarwa mai ƙarfi
Samu ƙimar rayuwar NotiGuy akan rabin farashin.
-> Akwatin rajistan farko kawai ake buƙata
A tsakiya a kasan allo (babu sauran mika hannu!)
Allon gefen dama (ya dace da ƙaramin salo: HOTO KAWAI)
Cikakken faɗi da cikakken tsayin matsayi
A tsakiya a cikin ramin kyamara
Ana shirin yin amfani da farko, da fatan za a sake gwadawa bayan ƴan daƙiƙa kaɗan.
Ayyuka 18+ don taɓa rami na kyamara
Nuna yayin da allon ke kashe ko a cikin tsarin AOD
Don tunatar da ku sanarwar rataye a halin yanzu, yayin da allon ke Kunna, maimaita nuna tsibirin kowane sakan %1$s

MUHIMMI: idan kana da wani irin wannan app, yayi ƙoƙarin kashe sanarwar buɗewa kuma ya kasa… zai shafi wannan app ɗin kuma ya sa ya gaza, don haka kafin a gwada, musaki irin wannan fasalin a cikin wasu apps, idan akwai. ko kashe Mai Sauraron Sanarwa
Lura: akan samsung app na iya ɓoye faɗowar sanarwar amma ba zai iya ɓoye taƙaitaccen sandar samsung don haka da fatan za a saita saitin sanarwa zuwa Cikakken a cikin saitunan tsarin -> sanarwa.
Nuna Sanarwa Mai Sauƙi kawai ba tare da nuna ainihin faɗowar sanarwar ba.
Kar a nuna yayin da allon ke cikin shimfidar wuri
Nuna taƙaitaccen gunkin mai rai yana wakiltar sabon yanayin ringi
"Nuna Sanarwa mai ƙarfi lokacin da kuke da sanarwa (al'amuran) kuma allon yana"
"- don aiki yayin da ake kashe allo, dole ne na'urar ta kasance tana da hanyar kulle, aƙalla (swipe don buɗewa) ko Koyaushe Ana kunna Nuni"
- idan sanarwar da aka karɓa yayin da allon ke kunne, kuma app ɗin ya nuna shi, ba zai sake nuna shi ba lokacin da allon ya kashe saboda kun riga kun san samun sa.
Za a yiwa sanarwar alama kamar yadda aka gani kawai lokacin da kuka faɗaɗa ta da hannu, ragewa ko shuɗe faɗaɗa sanarwar, swipe ƙaramar sanarwar ko watsi da ainihin sanarwar.
Idan %1$s Koyaushe Akan Nuni yana Kunna, nuna faɗakarwa mai ƙarfi a cikinsa
Za a ƙara sabbin salo akai-akai

Biyan kuɗin ku zai sake sabuntawa ta atomatik kuma za a caje ku adadin da aka ƙayyade a sama kowace shekara ko wata (wanda kuka zaɓa) har sai kun soke biyan kuɗin ku kafin ƙarshen lokacin biyan kuɗi na yanzu. Kuna iya sarrafa biyan kuɗi kuma ku kashe sabuntawar atomatik daga saitunan asusun Google Play. kuma daga wannan shafin gida na app -> ( Sarrafa Subscription ) button
Doke hagu ko dama zai cire samfoti na sanarwa ba ainihin sanarwar ba. kuma idan akwai ƙarin sanarwa na gaba za a nuna
Gwada wannan zaɓi na mintuna 5 kyauta
Gama saitin farko, kuma a tabbata an kunna izinin da ake buƙata, sannan danna gwaji don fara lokacin gwaji na mintuna 5.
Da farko yi gwada ganowa ta atomatik
Kuna iya gwada salon ƙima kafin siye. yi amfani da maɓallin samfoti (igon ido)
Ajiye shi har sai an karanta ko an soke sanarwar
Taɓawa ɗaya na iya haifar da taɓawa na bazata!
Ko ci gaba da iyakanceccen sigar

"- ƙaƙƙarfan aikace-aikacen don ramin kyamara mai hulɗa. - ƙarin fasali. - ikon saita ayyuka daban don taɓawa ɗaya, danna sau biyu, dogon taɓawa, matsa zuwa dama da karkata zuwa hagu. - ya dogara da izini ɗaya kawai."
Yanayin Aljihu, Yi watsi da taɓawa yayin kan allon kulle

Me yasa premium? wannan ya ɗauke mu aiki tuƙuru da fasali irin na maye gurbin sanarwar sanarwar da ke tashi tare da sanya tsayin sanarwar mai ƙarfi ya yi daidai da tsayin rami na kyamara keɓanta ga wannan app ɗin babu wani app akan playstore da zai iya yin wannan gami da makamantan apps balle salo da canza launi.
